Description.Text: The Okura Prestige Bangkok, an international luxury hotel situated in the heart of the leading commercial district along the prime ?Embassy row? area, with direct access to the BTS Skytrain. The Okura Prestige Bangkok?s guest accommodations are a luxurious blend of stylish, contemporary design, Japanese elegance and the convenience of modern technology. Guestrooms begin on the 26th floor with environmentally friendly triple glazing which insulates against sound and heat, as well as providing plenty of natural daylight and uninterrupted views of the city. All guestrooms have been designed with guest comfort in mind, with features such as a spacious Japanese style bathroom with separate shower and bathtub.

Only 5 minutes walk from BTS Station and easy access to the shopping area; Paragon Located in Bangkok?s CBD with direct access to the city?s efficient overhead rail network and close to shopping malls, embassies and tourist attractions.

Deluxe rooms are designed to allow the exquisite quality of their materials and finishing to shine. Every room is fitted to the highest standard and decorated with a subtle touch to create an atmosphere of contemporary elegance. Relax in our comfortable beds and enjoy the range of in-room entertainment facilities, or simply observe Bangkok life from high above the city through expansive windows

This breath-taking building?s design is an innovative, energy efficient ?ecoplex?, inspired by the ?wai?, the traditional greeting gesture in Thai culture which represents both respect and warmth. The Okura Prestige Bangkok embraces cutting-edge technology, together with modern comforts, a distinct air of elegant Japanese style and the charm of Thai hospitality.

-Yamazato-traditional Japanese cuisine is pure perfection. The quality of each dish is matched only by the attention to detail in preparation and presentation. - UP & Above -Redefining the art of all-day dining, this restaurant offers a contemporary, elegant setting. The ideal place to start and end your day in Bangkok. -Element -An intimate, engaging dining experience without the restraints of traditional fine dining. The open kitchen gives diners an ?up close and personal? feel. -Elements -the Okura Prestige?s signature restaurant Elements offers modern creative cuisine in a fabulous setting. Elements is an intimate and engaging dining experience with an open kitchen where patrons are welcome to marvel at the chef?s preparing their culinary delights. There is a variety of set menus and Ã la carte dishes skillfully prepared from the finest local and international ingredients. Each dish will be expertly explained by our hosts.
Lobby is located on the 24th floor of the hotel.
